episodes.summary: In an effort to get smarter, Kevin Smith recruits Andy McElfresh for a weekly erudite inquisition into the unknown! Presented in 4 easy to digest chapters! 1) The SCI: Face Blindness. 2) The FI: Dead Duck Fucks. 3) The WHY: Dream theory. And The BYE: Poodle Cats.
